metadata.title: CVE-2020-7774 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
The package y18n before 3.2.2, 4.0.1 and 5.0.5, is vulnerable to PrototypePollution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-y18n - 5.0.8+~5.0.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-y18n package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.8+~5.0.0-2').
